title: Deal low elo players
body:
So when you queue for a game of league of legends and you start it up there's something you should probably know. 

The game begins at 0:00

It does not start at 1:45

It does not start at 1:00

It starts at 0:00

The start of the game is not your time to check facebook. It's not to go smoke a cigarette. 

The amount of people in silver that just load in, buy items and then afk under tower for 2 minutes is fucking obscene.

If you're in silver you can win every fucking game if you can get all 5 of your teammates to invade the enemy bot side at the start of the game. Hell you don't even need 5 you can do it with 3 or 4 because the enemy top and mid are going to be sitting afk making a sandwich. The enemy jungle/adc/support are probably afk in the bush near the bot side buff. Of course pulling this off will be very difficult because your team will also be afk under tower/in jungle.

replies.body:
You'd be better off saying "Dear all players"

since it happens just as much in higher elos.
